items.dc:creator: Theodore Schleifer
items.content: Mr. Thiel, the Silicon Valley billionaire, is coming around to Donald Trump’s candidacy again after bumps in their relationship. But he thinks his money wouldn’t really help Trump.

items.content: In the 12 days since Ohio’s junior senator was tapped as the future of Donald J. Trump’s movement, old comments and a chorus of derision have blunted any sense of invulnerability.

items.content: The billionaire owner of the social media platform X reposted a video that mimics Vice President Kamala Harris’s voice, without disclosing that it had been altered.

items.title: Here’s what a Harris presidency could look like
items.dc:creator: Tami Luhby,Meg Tirrell,Ella Nilsen,Bryan Mena,Priscilla Alvarez,Alex Marquardt,Edward-Isaac Dovere
items.content: A week after announcing her run for president, Kamala Harris has yet to tell voters how she will address the key issues facing the nation. Her platform will likely be in the same vein as that of President Joe Biden.

items.creator: PBS News
items.title: WATCH: Harris pledges to defend reproductive rights at campaign event in Massachusetts
items.dc:creator: PBS News
items.content: Vice President Kamala Harris used her first fundraiser since becoming the Democrats' likely White House nominee to excoriate the Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump as determined to roll back Americans' freedoms.
items.contentSnippet: Vice President Kamala Harris used her first fundraiser since becoming the Democrats' likely White House nominee to excoriate the Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump as determined to roll back Americans' freedoms.

items.creator: Jay Senter,Neil Vigdor
items.title: Minnesota’s Governor, a Harris V.P. Contender, Calls Trump and Vance ‘Weird People’
items.dc:creator: Jay Senter,Neil Vigdor
items.content: Gov. Tim Walz took jabs at Trump and his vice-presidential pick, JD Vance, at a rally in St. Cloud, Minn., hours before the Republican duo were scheduled to arrive for their own campaign event.

items.creator: Brian Bennett/Pittsfield, Mass.
items.title: ‘Just Plain Weird’: Harris Embraces a New Label for Trump
items.dc:creator: Brian Bennett/Pittsfield, Mass.
items.content: Kamala Harris told supporters at a fundraiser Saturday that some of the things that Donald Trump and J.D. Vance "are saying, well, it's just plain weird."
items.contentSnippet: Kamala Harris told supporters at a fundraiser Saturday that some of the things that Donald Trump and J.D. Vance "are saying, well, it's just plain weird."

items.creator: Zachary B. Wolf,Simone Pathe
items.title: Analysis: How the Harris 2024 shake-up could affect House and Senate races
items.dc:creator: Zachary B. Wolf,Simone Pathe
items.content: Democrats’ substitution of Vice President Kamala Harris for President Joe Biden on ballot in November obviously resets the presidential race. It could also have a major impact on House and Senate races.
